price: Pero si se niegan a creer, sabe que a ti solo te incumbe transmitir [el Mensaje] con claridad.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
